text: anthar wishwa widyaliya shishya bala mandalaye kandawumkaru lahiru chathuranga wirasekara athulu shishya kriyakari samajikayin pasdena mema siddhiya sambandhayen apa matha mudahara thibuni.
eeka thamayi dan burumaye wemin pawathinne.
ayarlanthayen bihiwu dakshathama natya rachakaya lesa da salake.
kalathmaka athin da janapriyathwayen da eewa eka se paripurna ya.

eekayi aansar karanna bariwune..."

thriroda ratha prawahana sewa sapayuma wadi bawath, handiyak handiyak gane thriroda ratha kuliyata dima sandaha bala sitinnan sulabha bawatath, owun boho wita nikarune kalaya gatha karana bawatath masiwili nangenu pene.ma sithana paridi lankawe wathman thriroda ratha prawahana sewa sapayime welandapola aduma washayen sadhaniya lakshana dekak penwayi.

oonama kenakuta thaman wiwechanaya kirime ayithiyak athath rata ho janathawa ho pawa dimata ayithiyak nathayi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha prakasha kele ya.oonama kenakuta thama wiwechanaya kirime ayithiyak athath rata ho janathawa ho pawadimata ayithiyak nathayi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha prakasha kele ya.manawa ayithin pilibanda jathyantharaya chodana karana bawa pawasu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha, thama apahasuthawata path karannata asathya prachara gena giyath buddhimath janathawa me pilibanda awabodhayen sitina bawa kiweya.ape rate honda nithi paddhathiyak thibena bawa da siyalu denata ee nithiya eka se kriyathmaka kala haki bawada nithiyata pitupannata kisiwakutath nohaki bawada janapathiwaraya pawasiya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha me adahas pala kele lunugamwehera diyawara gammanaye janathawa eeye (14) amathamini.sanwardhanaya ada gamata gena gos thibena bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya, rate sanwardhana wadapiliwela idiriyata gena yannata janathawa ekwa sitina bawath kiweya.ada athamun wairi deshapalanayaka niratha wi sitina bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya, krodhayen, wairayen deshapalanaya karannata nohaki bawath pawasiya.
mama hithanne mathalan oba niwaradiyi.
jaya shri gen aanduwata kane paharak?
in owun ketikalina wasi laba ganima, pawathna aanduwa samaga hettu kirim kota labha aadiya labuwada samastha washayen drawida janathawata sethak wuye natha.

thaman trotskiwadi yayi kiyagath sanwidhanayak ithihasaye prathama wathawata dhanapathi aanduwakata athulu wima satahan karamin 1964 di lanka samasamaja pakshaya (lasasapa) dhanapathi shri lanka nidahas pakshaya samaga hawulak godanagu aakarayath, eyata erehiwa ema “maha pawadime” deshapalana saha nyayika anthargathaya wataha ganimata uthsaha kala tharuna kandayamak wisin wikosa godanagimata mulwu aakarayath malalagama penwa duni.
me eekabaddha wipakshaye inneth ee wage kattiyakya.
indiyawe inna balagathuma kattandi tika araliya gaha madure thiyagena gurukam walin pissu natana ape rajathumage bhara walata ahinsaka minissu billata dena eka harida ?
naththan kad eka aragena kol nokara ayata sitiya haki nisaya.
his ahasa:- aniwa ban mathaka athi kalekin kawe naha.anika ape paththe hoyagannawath nahane ban...

lankika kalawata yatin pawathi mema amanushika yantha්ranaya mulwarata ‘kalawa pilibanda kala wirodhi wicharayak’ mangin dipthi sahodaraya helidaraw karanne supanjith mema ga්ranthaya liwimata awama washayen dashaka ekahamarakatath peraya.
oba jiwathwana pradeshaya anuwa shampu thora
me sambandhayen wimarshanayak pawathwana lesa antharjathika polisiya magin aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa wetha danum dimak kara thibini.
mama dannawa obathuma ; obage komentuwen ape thiranaya wiwechanaya nokala bawa.
ee sandaha wiwidha karunu balapa thibena bawa eewa pariksha kara balanawita apata peni yanawa.hondayi.

rajapaksha smarakaya: methek sakakaruwaku lesa nam kara nomatha esema, shri lanka idam godakirime ha sanwardhanaya kirime sansthawe mudal wayakara madamulana di. ee. rajapaksha anusmarana kauthukagaraya ha smarakaya idikaramin rajaye mudal awabhawitha kirimata erehi naduwa juli 28da kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath adhikaranaya hamuwedi da wibhagayata ganimata niyamithaya.

api padinchi wela inne nirawul oppu thiyena idamwala.

ema yojanawa anuwa apa rate katayuthu adhikshanaya sandaha jathyanthara adhikshana mandalayak pihituwima ha apa rate hamudawa pilibanda thindu dima sandaha wideshiya winishchayakarawarunta ida dima yanadi karunuda athulath namuth ee siyallakma swairi, swadhina rajyayak washayen shri lankawe athulath ayithiyak wina wideshiya balapam matha wiya yuthu de nowe.

yatath wijitha dhaneshwaraye ediriwadi kandayam wetha balaya maru kirima, wada wada karalikari wu kamkaru panthiya mardanaya kirima saha idam himikarithwaya, kulawadaya ha anekawidha wadawasam sunbun wiplawawadiwa perala damima walakwima ilakka karagath, hudek adhirajyawadi aadhipathyaye aakruthiya wenas kirimak pamanak wiya.
aapasu harimata ho, paradimata ho, idak nothaba jayaganimama aramunu karagath, maha sangramaya salasum kirima, mohothakudu apathe nohara aarambha kerina.
me dena ida kada athule monawa noweyida ?
heta eya owunta ma wiruddhawa yoda ganiwi.

anathuruwa rawana raju wenas kota thakimen thorawu thama rajadhaniye hidaganimin, thama athitha niwaradiwu kriyawangen prabodhamathwa, siyalu granthayan awabodha karaganime dakshathawayan ayath karaganimin, yamak athi satiyenma dakime buddhimahimaya laga karaganimin, anyangen sawayaththa wemin, karanayan athiwishishta lesa thamagema buddhiyen nirikshanaya karamin, akramikawath tharkanayangen thora wu wignyanaya ukahaganimin, winayanu kula shreshta yogiwarayek men thama thula athi siyalu wishishta aakarayan(hakiyawan) mana lesa prathyaksha karaganimin, thamathula athi sukshama awabodhayan mulumaninma hadunaganimin, sukshama lesa badhawan jayaganimata awasi sama awadhiyakama aawenika wu lakshanayan pilibadawa danuma sahithawa, sitha, manasa ha manowignyanaya yana 3n swabhawayan awabodha karaganime prithiyen, thunkal pawathma kapa damiya haki wana darshanaya labaganimin, siyalu darshanikayange hethupala dahama pilibada tharkayan widhanaya kota thaba ganime danumen yukthawa thama abhyanthara wignyanayen mulumaninma thathagatha garbhaya therumganimin, mulumaninma buddhathwa awadiya therum ganimin, kisima dinaka wenas nowanna wu buddha margaya (buddha margayata piwisime gnyanaya) thamawisinma soyaganna ladi.
